title: Ex-NFL LB Darron Lee arrested, charged with murder, police say

sources.name: ESPN NFL
sources.title: Ex-NFL LB Darron Lee charged in girlfriend's death
sources.description: Former NFL linebacker Darron Lee, the Jets' first-round pick in 2016, was arrested and charged with first-degree murder in the death of his girlfriend, the Hamilton County (Tennessee) Sheriff's Office announced Friday.

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Ex-NFL LB Darron Lee arrested, charged with murder, police say
sources.description: The Hamilton County (Tennessee) Sheriff's Office is charging former NFL linebacker Darron Lee with first-degree murder and tampering with evidence.
